dev.name: Moss
dev.description: This is the dev release that's currently actively being developed on. It is recommended to use this one for developing new Tools for the Weave.

stable.name: Moss (Sprout)
stable.description: This release will soon be replaced by 0.13.0 as the new stable release. If you intend to develop a new Tool for the Weave, it is recommended to use the dev version instead.
